channel.title: Looking for a coder Asap
channel.description: Guys im new to the coding stuff i bought domain name and webhost or whatever got vps and all that i need a coder i got my sources and all that i addded some new shops and shifted some things around new teles and stuff but i need a new coder i can make it so about 60 percent donations go to you so if someone ends up donating 100 dollars u get 40 or someone donates 50 dollars you get 20 or something or we can negotiate i dont got money now to upfront pay you but i guess if u can take a mans word its cool also when you log in server you get owner and all asap btw if u can atleast give my server a chance bro's add me on skype live::gezmis1998 i mean think about it 40 percent all donations FOREVER. AND EVERY DONATION MADE. 60 PERCENT. NOT BAD RIGHT? :) so think about it Oh and btw the main thing is all i need is for someone to help me use this vps shit hard as fk. just help with vps get the server online 24.7 i guess so it works and sit back relax and just wait for the cash to flow in am i not right? i mean dont get me wrong if i had the money straight up i'd offer it but obv thats why im offering 60 percent donations so just yeah chill and wait for money to flow in what more can a coder ask for really? well appart from upfront cash :p

item.title: Looking for a coder Asap
item.dc:creator: @Turkpride33 Turkpride33
item.description:
@Turkpride33 wrote:

source is aggroth and what needs coding absolutley nothing just need help getting server online and stick around incase something would need coding add me on skype live::gezmis1998

Read full topic

and seriously how does 60% of £100 = £40 -_-
